texts.name: Mirolub
texts.biography: Mirolub is known as a humble druid, who spends most of the time in the forest. But most people do not know that Mirolub was formerly known a brutal patron of most taverns of Erathia and was known as troublemaker there.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Bears and Tzar Bears for each level attained after 3th level.
